item.description:
INDOOR SKETCH GET-TOGETHER

WHEN: 1-2 hours starting at the posted time

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Let's meet in the Tavern, immediately to your right when you enter the Inn.

DIRECTIONS: Take Route 20W off of route 128. Continue straight into Sudbury. You'll pass a lot of stuff, eventually coming to a road that bears right at about 2:00 (direction, not time) with a sign "Wayside Inn". Take that, and the Inn is on your right.

THE SCENE: The Tavern of the Wayside Inn is just beautiful, and small, with a fireplace, pewter mugs, an historic bar. There is a limit on RSVPs to this one, since we can't flood the place. I would hope everyone would at least order something, a coke, beer, coffee, wine, so that we are paying customers for the hour.

OTHER: This is more of a travel session, so please pack extra light, ideally nothing more than a 5x8 sketchbook. Also, expect that we will converse while we sketch, unlike most BPAAG meet-ups.


IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call the Inn or myself.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: INDOOR SKETCH GET-TOGETHER: Wayside Inn, Sudbury
